channel.title: The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'T' on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'T' on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is a Trojan (Trojan Horse)?
item.description: A Trojan horse, or Trojan, is a type of malicious software that is designed to deceive users into believing it is legitimate while actually performing undesirable or harmful actions on their systems.

item.title: What is a Terminal?
item.description: The Terminal, also known as the command line or command prompt, is a powerful tool for interacting with your computer’s operating system.

item.title: What is Torrent?
item.description: Torrent is a file-sharing technology that allows users to download and share large files, for example, movies, music, and software, over the internet.

item.title: What is a TCP Wrapper?
item.description: A “wrapper” is a layer of software that provides an additional layer of abstraction between two different systems or protocols.
